name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TravelersScene.com - Access Maps from New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover a simple way to find directions from your new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This free extension modifies your new tab page by adding:

1.Shortcuts to popular maps providers (Google Maps, Bing Maps, MapQuest & Yandex Maps) 
2. Shortcuts to top sites including Gmail, Facebook & Youtube.
3. Easy access to Yahoo Search via the search box.

It's completely free, so try it today!
